metadata.title: Agents Directory Cleanup Summary
metadata.purpose: Summary of agents directory cleanup and restructuring work

cleanup_objectives.primary_goal: Clean up agents directory structure to only contain essential directories
secondary_goals: Move files to proper archive locations
Maintain all important documentation and work

files_moved.reason: Changelog files should be archived by date
Current structure summary belongs in LATEST
Test files should be archived, not in root

directories_removed.reason: Empty after moving changelog file to archive
Empty standards subdirectory, moved to archive structure
Empty after moving structure summary to LATEST
Empty after moving recipe-test files to archive
Empty after moving test files to archive

directories_created.reason: Archive location for recipe test files

agents_root.description: Clean root directory with only essential directories
contents: ARCHIVE/ - All archived documents and future archive locations
LATEST/ - Current handoff, analysis, and core documents

archive_structure.description: Comprehensive archive structure for all document types
contents: ARCHIVE/config/ - Configuration files (empty, for future use)
ARCHIVE/handoff/ - Handoff documents (empty, for future use)
ARCHIVE/jobs/ - Job documents (empty, for future use)

latest_structure.description: Current active documents and core standards
contents: bootstrap/ - Core standards and active jobs

benefits_achieved.clarity: Clear separation between current work and archived materials
benefits_achieved.organization: Logical structure that's easy to navigate and understand
benefits_achieved.future_proofing: Archive directories ready for future document types

preserved_components: All core bootstrap documents and standards
All active jobs and research guides
All test files and research materials
preserved_work.verification: No files were lost during cleanup process

immediate: Focus on fixing kitchen system critical issues identified in CURRENT_ANALYSIS.json
Implement Git workflow system as documented
ongoing: Use archive structure for future document archival
Maintain clean LATEST directory with only current documents
Follow established patterns for new document creation

verification_completed: Directory structure is clean and organized

notes.cleanup_success: Agents directory is now clean, organized, and ready for efficient agent workflow
notes.archive_benefits: Archive structure provides clear organization for all document types
notes.maintenance_ease: Reduced complexity makes directory easier to maintain and navigate
notes.future_ready: Structure supports future growth and document archival needs
